name: LibraryItem.Category
desc: The kinds of library items that you can create.

items.name: static let control: LibraryItem.Category
items.desc: A category for controls, like buttons and context menus.

items.name: static let effect: LibraryItem.Category
items.desc: A category for effects, like opacity and saturation modifiers.

items.name: static let layout: LibraryItem.Category
items.desc: A category for items that manage layout, like stack views and frame modifiers.
